content:
If You have any questions after reading these documents, please contact Your insurance agent, broker or Us.

If You need to change anything, please contact Us immediately.

## HOW YOUR INSURANCE POLICY OPERATES
This policy, the Policy Schedule and any Endorsement or Memoranda thereon shall be considered one document (all of which are hereinafter collectively referred to as the "Policy") and any word or expression to which a specific meaning has been attached in any of them shall bear such meaning throughout.

Whereas:
1) Insured Person(s) by an application form or statements made to Us, including a declaration made to Us, which shall be the basis of and shall form part of this Policy, has applied for insurance;
and
2) HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. ("the Company") has agreed to provide such insurance.
questions: What steps should an insured person take if they have questions about their policy, and what are the implications of contacting either the insurance agent, broker, or the company directly regarding policy details and claims?
In what scenarios would an insured person need to contact the insurance company immediately for changes, and what processes are in place for making those changes to ensure continued coverage?

How does the integration of the Policy, Policy Schedule, and any Endorsements or Memoranda affect the interpretation of terms and conditions, and what should an insured person understand about the collective nature of these documents?

What are the implications of the application form and statements made by the insured person in relation to the validity of the insurance policy, and how do these elements interact with the coverage provided by HL Assurance Pte. Ltd.?

What are the potential consequences for an insured person if they fail to accurately complete the application form or provide truthful statements, and how might this affect their coverage or claims process?
How does HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. determine the acceptance of an insurance application, and what criteria are used to evaluate the information provided by the insured person?
What should an insured person know about the importance of declarations made to the insurance company, and how do these declarations influence the terms of the policy and the coverage provided?
What are the key components that make up the insurance policy as defined in the text, and how do these components work together to provide comprehensive coverage for the insured person?
In what ways can changes to the policy affect the insured person's coverage, and what specific types of changes are most commonly requested or required by policyholders?

What are the responsibilities of both the insured person and HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. in maintaining the integrity of the insurance policy, and how do these responsibilities impact the overall insurance experience?
